channel.title: Sitenews on Learning CFEngine 3
channel.description: Recent content in Sitenews on Learning CFEngine 3

item.title: Finally, an update about “Learning CFEngine 3”!
item.description: I know, I know. It’s been over two years since the last post, and other than my occasional comment on the IRC channel or mailing list, you couldn’t be blamed to think that I had disappeared from the face of the earth. But I’m back! And I have a few updates for you: I am finally working again on the new release of the book! It will focus on the upcoming CFEngine 3.
